subject: Good Credit or Not
body:
Your credit score does not matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE money to spend ANY way you like, or simply require to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you THIS EVENING (hurry, this deal will expire NOW):
$444,000+ debt
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have set the lowest current payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill this user-friendly form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!!
http://catalyjlgent.com/
